name: Camie® 300 General Purpose Spray Adhesive
description: Camie® 300 General Purpose Spray Adhesive was especially formulated to bond paper, cardboard, fabric, leather, foil, fiberglass to metal, wood, and a variety of other substrates. It is especially useful in the screen print, pool table, and sewing industries. Camie® 300 is essentially colorless and is an Aerosol Adhesive. It offers quick tack and produces bonds that may be temporary or permanent.
